abstract: The billionaire financier Leon Black has recently made as many headlines for his art patronage as for his business deals. On Tuesday, he combined the two, announcing an acquisition of Phaidon Press, a leading publisher of fine art books.
snippet: The billionaire financier Leon Black has recently made as many headlines for his art patronage as for his business deals. On Tuesday, he combined the two, announcing an acquisition of Phaidon Press, a leading publisher of fine art books.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire financier Leon Black has recently made as many headlines for his art patronage as for his business deals. On Tuesday, he combined the two, announcing an acquisition of Phaidon Press, a leading publisher of fine art books.

headline.main: Billionaire Financier Leon Black Buys Art Publisher Phaidon

abstract: Soon after it was purchased by Leon Black’s Apollo Global Management, Realogy was considered virtually insolvent. But then Apollo went to work.
snippet: Soon after it was purchased by Leon Black’s Apollo Global Management, Realogy was considered virtually insolvent. But then Apollo went to work.
lead_paragraph: Realogy, the operator of Century 21 and other real estate businesses, is the Rocky Balboa of corporate America. Left for dead in the financial crisis, Realogy has not only survived but is now in a Rocky-like comeback, planning an initial public offering.

headline.main: The Private Equity Wizardry Behind Realogy’s Comeback
headline.print_headline: The Private Equity Wizardry Behind Realogy’s Comeback
